Reviews.Title: Good basic phone
Reviews.Author: carrie s.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my husabnd, so that we could down grade our spirnt plan and save money. It is a great basic phone. Bright screen, crsip call and sound voulme, good sized buttons. Basic text,talk, and camera / picture options works well. Screen is too small from some photos but all and all it is good quailty. Does have an SD card slot for bringing photos, contact, and music from phone to phone. You can play you music on the phone and the speaker quality is okay. Does bring over all your files from the sd card in long form files. To find a song you have to scroll all the way to the end of the file name to find out the song title, but other than that great phone. Very rugged and durable just as the name says, outside screen rugged and hard to scratch or break. Just becareful of the inside screen, dont slam the phone shut! The inside screen is somewhat prone to dings and scratches. Gets better service (bars) then my smart phone did, drops calls a lot less. Just a warning if you have an air-rave device like I do in my home to get service, and you find that you can not send or recived texts call air-rave support frist. The air-rave can only understand a few phone numbers/ signals at a time, and air-rave support will have to reset our phone allowance to your new phone from your old. That fixes the issue! I spent hours with sprint customer service figureing that one out!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for long battery life and calling
Reviews.Author: B. Buller "Young Money"
Reviews.Content: My father test drove an Android phone and while he is ok with electronics... for whatever reason him answering that phone became a chore...I looked on Sprint for his old style flip phone but one that was a bit more updated and 'rugged'. This fit the bill. Found it new-used through a seller her on Amazon and this phone is perfect. It gets real loud ring wise, the loudspeaker is... loud! Does the basics of what he needs. Downgraded his plan to the Talk 450 and I figure I can haggle with Sprint if he gets close to his allotment of minutes but I dont think he will.Overall, this phone is very nice and while I sport the likes of a Note II (that I love), this phone is great for the use of being an actual phone!

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Whit
Reviews.Content: I don't need all the bells and whistles, just something to talk and text with. This phone is for people who want a PHONE. Loud speaker-phone, long lasting battery, and heavy duty. Perfect!

Reviews.Title: very good for a "dumb phone", and yes it has a sd card slot
Reviews.Author: Donna J.
Reviews.Content: we own 3 of these...the short of itPROS:good camera for a dumb phonecan play music.long battery lifehas a micro sd card and supports a 32 gig cardgood call quality and loud speakerextremely durableCONS:direct connect support is pretty much nonexistenta bit thick in the back pocketcannot play .wav musicyou need a converter to put ear buds in it (has a micro aux connection or whatever you call it)it took me 2 years to figure out this phone had a sd card slot. (you now know why i dont have a smart phone) if you open up the battery slot and take out the battery there is a thin metal square that can be opened up to put the sd card under. i always thought it was a heatsink or some other electro gizmo on the phone. the phones internal memory is too small to directly transfer music to so that got me really excited. the music player is basic, but it will play even when the phone is closed (something a surprising number of phones wont do)the camera doesn't compare to smartphones at all but it is the best camera i have seen on a dumb phone. it takes clear pictures when you need it and doesent get a lot of "noise"the battery life is amazing, i can easily go 2 or 3 weeks without charging if i just have the thing in my pocket at work and make a few calls per day (on battery saver mode) even if you have music going on you phone it will last you all day. i remember our old (old old )moterola razors and you just barely made it through the day before your phone died every single day.the phone itself just looks... durable. actually it looks like a juggernaught or optimus prime compared to all the other phones out there. its a bit thick in the back pocket, but you wont ever have to worry about replacing it. you can buy it used used for under 25$, something i would NEVER do with any other phone. we all had sliders before we got these phones and i think we averaged three or four broken phones in two years. those were 50-75$ a pop, and the last slider had the battery compartment held together by scotch tape.personally we never use the direct connect feature but i know a company that has them all for their employees and they say its pretty much unusable.if you do a lot of texting the 9 key pad is going to get annoying, but for normal calling it works great, and has plenty of space between buttons so your fingers dont feel cramped.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for less expensive plan
Reviews.Author: mhs
Reviews.Content: Easy to read, Fast charging in less of 5 minutes. Easy to use, very bright screen, durable.Came with Charger, Charger outlet has a light on it also.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Bud Walker
Reviews.Content: Good Phone for a teenager who continually drops and mistreats his device.  Texting is not easy, but I prefer to speak with him rather than text.

Reviews.Title: A heavy duty stylish durable long lasting battery great phone
Reviews.Author: xxxxxman
Reviews.Content: This is a phone only a phone designed as a phone and is specifically manufactured to allow a person to talk with a device that fulfills your every telephone need!  If you want to txt you can but that has nothing to do with a telephone.We like the phone, this is our third Kyocera purchase ~  we have iPads for the internet and emailing, all we want from our phone is to be the best phone~this is in the top 10.The product was new in a factory sealed box and arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Lartigue "Patricia Lartigue"
Reviews.Content: This phone works great with my hearing aides. It rings loud enough that I hear it every time it rings, no more missed calls.

Reviews.Title: DuraXT Works Good
Reviews.Author: BH
Reviews.Content: The Direct Connect Radio /Phone works good. I wish the Sprint network would hurry up and finish upgrading in the Phoenix area so they would work GREAT.

Reviews.Title: customer service great
Reviews.Author: Sydnie A.
Reviews.Content: I initially had trouble verifying with my cell phone company that this phone was available to add to my plan, but the seller was EXTREMELY helpful and honest and was able to square everything away so that the phone is up and running for me. GREAT!!!

Reviews.Title: Practically new phone, fast shipping
Reviews.Author: mslvdc
Reviews.Content: Ordered a used phone from them. It arrived in almost brand new condition with charger. There was no box or manual but it was really easy to figure out.  The phone itself is not impressive but it's very rugged and is a great replacement with a clean ESN. Would order from them again.

Reviews.Title: DuraXT
Reviews.Author: None
Reviews.Content: I wish I could buy another one at the same great price I got this one.  Works better than I imagined.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Jeremy L. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a more durable phone that could handle being out in the elements. I've got a Galaxy SII that is great but wanted something a little more rugged, yet not a dinosaur.  This phone fits nicely,  I had no trouble activating it with Sprint, did it all online in a chat session.  The phone has Bluetooth so I was able to pair it to my car and my headset easily.  The call quality is great and the battery time is astounding.  Charge it maybe once per week, and it will fit the charger I already have for my car.  I like to have my phone outside when I am in the pool, or on a boat in the summer and I know that I won't have to worry about this one.  The phone I got was like new, well packed and shipped ultra fast.

Reviews.Title: nice simple rugged phone
Reviews.Author: Greg Himrod
Reviews.Content: Shipped quickly as advertised no complaints other than its a little more bulky than I was looking for but for the price great buyL

Reviews.Title: Sprint Kyocera DuraXT Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: LOVE this phone.  My husband is not so easy on phones and this is working out great for him.  I would recommend this to anyone ho does not have a gentle touch.  Speaker is awesome which he uses most of the time.

Reviews.Title: Best Basic Phone on the Market
Reviews.Author: Jim D
Reviews.Content: Tested 10 hours of talk time - extended battery available if needed that probably kicks in another 5 hours.The speakerphone could wake up the dead & there is a dedicated speaker key on the face of the phone so you don't have to mess with the dreaded soft key or a speaker key on the side of the phone. Clear as a bell maxed out.Large keys with a good tactile feel.I have never had this 'pocket dial' on me - ever.  I have never had an issue hearing someone or having them sound poor and no one has ever complained about that to me.Too bad Kyocera isn't available from AT&T; & Verizon but I was able to put mine on a Verizion reseller now I have 800mhz love all day and great indoor reception.

Reviews.Title: my husband love this phone
Reviews.Author: Marisia J.
Reviews.Content: My husband love the phone - he like the old fashion and easy phone to use - plus he is always dropping and breaking phones.

Reviews.Title: Seems good
Reviews.Author: Monira Mansoory
Reviews.Content: Got this phone for my mom because she doesn't do well with technology. She has been through several phones because she either loses it or breaks it frequently. I like that this phone seems very sturdy and will last a long time. Phone isn't up-to-date but wasn't looking for something expensive and this is good for the price.

Reviews.Title: An excellent phone choice for anyone needing durability
Reviews.Author: pegmorris
Reviews.Content: This phone is very durable. The quality is there. My brother is a contractor adn these phones are not treated well and stillkeep on working. Battery life is unbelievable and this is a great phone. Highly recomend if you need simplicity adn a work phone that cna take punishment.

Reviews.Title: Use with TING happy with it.
Reviews.Author: S. Jensen
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone to use with ting and save money. This has really worked out well especially since this is my first cellphone.

Reviews.Title: Replacing basic phone
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: My old Sprint basic phone went bad; needed a new phone quick without Sprint bumping me up to a more expensive plan for a free phone with renewing my contract.  It seems to be a great phone, easy to use.  If you drop your phone a lot this is a good phone to have; rugged.  It's easy to read and operate.  My old Bluetooth device hooked up easily.  Great phone for the price too!

Reviews.Title: Always does the job!
Reviews.Author: Nancy J Nickoles
Reviews.Content: Works great!  Just what I was looking for.  Nice rugged phone. It keeps my husband in touch with his men no matter where he is.

Reviews.Title: So Happy
Reviews.Author: Debbie Griffin
Reviews.Content: I did a stupid thing, tried to answer my phone while getting into a bathroom stall .  Big mistake, somehow my phone fell into the toilett and the motion made the toilett flush, I grabbed it and the power of the flush was so strong, I had to hold the phone until  the flush stopped.  I tried the rice thing, but my phone wasn't drying out.  I didn't want my husband to know what I did.  The SPRINT store wanted to sell one for way more than it was worth.  I checked on AMAZON and found one like I ruined.  It was very affordable and I got it  in less time than was anticipated.  I'm very pleased with my phone.  It's a great phone for people who want a phone and not a computer.  I like being able to take pictures with it also.

Reviews.Title: my pops LOVES his Christmas Phone!
Reviews.Author: reazon i am needing help
Reviews.Content: my pops LOVES this phone!  he is a senior and phones that are hand held computers are NOT his cup of tea! he likes the feel of this phone in his hands and it functions in a way that is great for a technologically challenged senior of 81 years. he gives it 5 stars and so do I! i will trust this seller in the future

Reviews.Title: Tough as nails and performs well.
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a good quality military spec phone that performs well and will literally take a beating, look no further. You can throw this phone into a wall and will have absolutely no effect on it. For basic flip phones, you can't beat this one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent basic phone
Reviews.Author: Robert Berg
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my girlfriend to replace her smartphone. She loves it. Durable and easy to hear to ringing.

Reviews.Title: Replacement for Poor Carrier Offering
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Heath Castello "Mary E. Castello"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband, because of the trouble he was having with the phone he received from our carrier - I had bought one for my brother a year ago, and he really liked this model, so I took a chance that hubby would, too. And he did.

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: Demi Hoang
Reviews.Content: Received our phone and it was as described.  A little bit bulky, but overall it does what we need it to do.

Reviews.Title: Rugged flip style phone
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: I was provided with this phone by my employer so I didn't actually pay for it myself.  The phone is rugged and rated as intrinsically safe for use in explosion hazard areas.  We have several class 1 div 2 areas at my work and I can carry and use the phone in those areas without risk.  I like the built in antenna better than my old Motorola deployable style.  The phone holds nice in your hand and you aren't pushing buttons accidentaly all the time.  The camera is pretty good and has a nice zoom function.  Downside- Battery life is "short" in my opinion.  Needs to charge about every 3-4 days with moderate useage and when the battery dies, it's DEAD.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Adriana
Reviews.Content: It is durable, waterproof, and great if you just want a basic phone for calling and texting.  The only cons about this phone is that it is bulky but I can deal with.

Reviews.Title: One tough Motha
Reviews.Author: Dank_Vader
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone for my father, who is anti-smart phone.  Set it up for him, and while doing so, observed the overall ruggedness of this phone.  It's built like a brick $#@* house.  I would say nearly indestructible. Menus are pretty much like any other flip phone, with maybe a better layout than most flip phones, but straight forward and easy to work with. As far as the battery, it lasts for a very long time on a single charge(unlike today's smart phones).  He is more than pleased with it, and he and I both would suggest it to anyone who is in the market for a flip phone.  Only down side I can think of is that it is thicker than other flip phones, but not too much so, and it feels nice and sturdy in your hand.  Good design, water resistant, long battery life, and near unbreakable. If you're in the market for a flip phone, you can't go wrong with this one.  :)

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: freed
Reviews.Content: I love the phone. Texting is a little challenging and the the phone is a little to fat, but the phone as a phone is great and strong.

Reviews.Title: Sprint Kyocera DuraXT phone
Reviews.Author: Daniel Schult
Reviews.Content: Best phone I've ever had...it even survived a dunk in the lake.  Strong reception and many good features.  It is a rugged phone.

Reviews.Title: Basic, rugged, and functional.
Reviews.Author: YunGirl
Reviews.Content: Brought it for a family member who wanted a simple basic phone that is able to call and take some pictures. Family member was glad to get it and was able to bring it to Sprint to connect there account to. It works and functions alright and voice calls are crisp and clear, which is a bonus since they don't require to need a hearing aid (family member is slightly disabled).

Reviews.Title: Okay...
Reviews.Author: Timothy Yang
Reviews.Content: Kind of damaged and the pin is locked...it is what it is though. It has everything the basic cell phone needs.

Reviews.Title: RE: " Sprint Kyocera DuraXT Bluetooth Camera GPS Rugged Phone (Unlocked Phone)"
Reviews.Author: Mark Currier
Reviews.Content: " Sprint Kyocera DuraXT Bluetooth Camera GPS Rugged Phone (Unlocked Phone)"How did you unlock your phone??Because Sprint wants to charge exorbitant prices ($49.99/mo. not including TAXES) compared to ConsumerCellular ($14.95/mo.) for nearly the same plan and better area service, the switch is a no-brainer for me.My problem is, I have two DuraXT's from Sprint that I have yet to learn how to unlock, I cannot use them on another carrier. I opened it up and there is no sim card or slot for one, tho there is a microSD card in it. I love these durable phones! The program/features of these phones is unparallelled. Lots of customization, when this phone rings, it rings loud! No missed calls for sure. Very rugged exterior, just what I bought it for. If there is a way to unlock my phones, please tell me!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Judi Anderson
Reviews.Content: Needed a phone for my gadget-phobic bf. He didn't want a smart phone, just a good, solid reagular cell phone. This one fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: Phone was bought for my son, and it is working great.
Reviews.Author: Adapo2001
Reviews.Content: This phone was bought because it looked like it would be durable and efficient for someone who seems to be hard on cell phones.  Right now it is serving it's purpose.

Reviews.Title: Sprint Radio service stinks  Phone part is ok
Reviews.Author: LOUPCI
Reviews.Content: Sprint sent me DuraXT's for free I was a Nextel customer for 14 yrs. I would only take them with no contract they agreed.  I couldn't keep my same plans of course it ended up being more. Free incoming 400 was history no longer avail how convenient for them.  I am in Miami and they started turning off the Nextel towers here as they say they will do by mid 2013 it would completely  off. .  My Motorola Nextel's were awesome radio worked every time.  I would of kept them forever except I was getting no service even inside the Sprint store. Shutting off towers in Miami.  The new Sprint phones I received the radio doesn't work.  99 out of 100 it may go through.  I called customer service they said that's the way it works we know about the problem and are working on it.  Error 300 error 3000 error error error bla bla bla and it's not your phone.  The only reason I stayed with Sprint was cause of the radio. I have read before also on reviews and the worse thing is the PTT  Push to talk button is THE WORST!  It's so so light to the touch it engages it constantly just by holding the phone. Kyrocera is no MOTOROLA they know how to make a two way radio.  All my other Motorola Nextel you had to mash the button somewhat.  This one you just brush it and your on the radio mode doesn't matter it doesn't work anyway did I say the radio doesn't work yet? The only good thing about the phone is how loud the speaker is other then that nothing. The radio is useless did did I say they already? Basically SUCKS!  As for the phone I don't really have and complaints.  For a phone it's ok as for a radio its crap.  ATT is supposed to have some type of radio also. I have never seen one. Of course it all cost more. As for the Sprint phone service in Miami is works well.  When I speak to my wife who is on ATT I get that digital fade on her end. Florida is a very hi tech state when it come to phone service with many choices and decent coverage. My Sprint phone is costing me $50 per mo unlimited phone and text no data.  I am thinking of going with Simple Talk/ Net10  for $45 per mo with $2.50 discount per mo if you go with auto pay.  That makes it $42.50 per mo. That's unlimited phone, text, data/web.  No contracts and I am going to pick a phone that works on Verizon for like half the cost. I think they limit your speed on data but that's fine with me  I just have to buy a phone no contract it cost more up front.  The phones are limited not much if a selection on android smart phones to chose from. Your safer buying one from them direct for the area your in.

Reviews.Title: bad phones
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: These phones are junk. point blank. my husband and each have it and hate them. the only reason we keep them is the fact that there cheap and almost out of contract would never recomend this phone. I would give this phone a negitive star rating. but i am required to give at least a 1star rating.

Reviews.Title: I prefer the motorola phones sprint once offered.
Reviews.Author: ANDREW RUPP
Reviews.Content: This phone I had to repurchase through Amazon.  the first one I bought at a sprint store.  failed two months into a sprint contract. The plastic is less hard wearing than a similar phone that was once available for sprint use by Motorola. I bought this phone for replacement parts.  As the back cover often falls off,  (now lost).  I did not buy insurance through sprint.  I would suggest insurance on this 'rugged' phone.... you really may need it.  Sprint offered to replace it for $348.00  otherwise I am stuck with a contract that I have to pay for but can not actually use.  For this item, I am glad amazon exists.Most normal applications that had been included on 'rugged flip-style phones' are add-on's that you can purchase through sprint or online.  (additional internet fees per byte apply if not included in phone contract)

Reviews.Title: Screen broke from sitting in the sun
Reviews.Author: Damien Nichols
Reviews.Content: Had this phone for two days. Left it on my coffee table overnight. Woke up to the sun shining directly on it and the screen refusing to function. It was a used phone but I bought it specifically b/c it was a military grade ruggedized phone. Super disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
Kyocera DuraXT Dura XT Sprint Military Spec Rugged Phone
Rugged Military Spec Sprint Kyocera DuraXT Cell Phone
3.2MP Camera, PIC Bridge, LED Flash
ProductInfo.Name: Sprint Kyocera DuraXT Bluetooth Camera GPS Rugged Phone
